articles.description: Irish jockey Michael O'Sullivan has died aged 24 after a fall at Thurles earlier this month.
articles.title: Michael O'Sullivan: Irish jockey dies after Thurles fall

articles.description: Mikel Merino makes his case to be Arsenal's striker solution after his match-winning heroics in the vital win at Leicester City, says BBC Sport Chief Football Writer Phil McNulty
articles.title: Can Mikel Merino be the solution to Arsenal striker crisis?

articles.description: A 4 Nations game between the USA and Canada descends into chaos with three fights breaking out between players in the first nine seconds.
articles.title: USA v Canada ice hockey fight: Three fights in first nine seconds before US go on to win

articles.description: There is not much Erling Haaland has failed to do when it comes to scoring goals since he joined Manchester City, although none of his 11 hat-tricks have come quicker than Omar Marmoush's first for the club.
articles.title: Omar Marmoush: How Egyptian striker can pick up Man City's goalscoring slack

articles.description: Jannik Sinner's doping case has divided the tennis world for months, with the news he will serve a three-month ban leading to further questions and criticism.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner doping ban: 'Sad day for tennis' that leaves 'sour taste'

articles.description: Mac McClung jumps over a car on his way to winning his third straight NBA Slam Dunk context at the All Star weekend in San Francisco.
articles.title: Mac McClung wins third straight Slam Dunk title at NBA All Star weekend

articles.description: Jude Bellingham is sent off as Real Madrid miss the chance to move four points clear at the top of La Liga in a frustrating draw against Osasuna.
articles.title: Osasuna 1-1 Real Madrid: Jude Bellingham sent off as La Liga leaders held

articles.description: Manchester United's Ruben Amorim and Tottenham's Ange Postecoglou talk about the pressure at both clubs going into Sunday's mid-table battle.
articles.title: Tottenham v Man Utd preview: Two managers under pressure, two clubs underperforming

articles.description: Everton have picked up more points than any other Premier League team since David Moyes returned to Goodison Park in January.
articles.title: David Moyes: How Everton boss turned club around and made them Premier League's in-form team

articles.description: Jack Catterall suffered a split-decision points defeat to Arnold Barboza Jr in Manchester, dealing a major blow to the British light-welterweight's world-title ambitions.
articles.title: Jack Catterall vs Arnold Barboza Jr: Briton loses by split decision in close contest
